subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Rocco Mediate’s everyman persona, self-depreciating wit and unpretentious attitude have won him legions of fans in the last several days at Torrey Pines.
snippet: Rocco Mediate’s everyman persona, self-depreciating wit and unpretentious attitude have won him legions of fans in the last several days at Torrey Pines.
